{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Ubiquiti Networks SR71-X.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = High-Power 802.11n Express Card |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Ubiquiti_Networks_SR71-X |wikipedia = |brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = SR71-X |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = July 13, 2009 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Ubiquiti_Networks_SR71-X |sernum = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |if = ExpressCard/34 |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 002a |subvendor_id = 0777 |subdevice_id = 4f05 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:15:6D |chip1 = Atheros;AR9280;AR9280-AL1E, NK4687.00B, 0841, TAIWAN; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MMCX |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = 2.4/5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SE2593A20;SiGe, 2593A20, 920ASHF;2;,,, Serial EEPROM;STMicroelectronics;ST24C32WP;24C32WP, ST 8921C;1; |flags = high power |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B004EI0H20 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== aka '''SR71X''' The FCC ID printed on the unit is SWX-SR71.. however, this is the FCC ID for the [[Ubiquiti SR71-A]]. :"FCC ID: SR71-X" is silkscreened on the / a unit's (white) PCB.. along with "UBIQUITI NETWORKS (C) 2008" and "MT M 94V-0". There is no visible date code. ==Notes== ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
05:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Qualcomm Atheros AR928X Wireless Network Adapter (PCI-Express) [168c:002a] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Ubiquiti Networks, Inc. SR71-X 802.11abgn Wireless ExpressCard Adapter [AR9280] [0777:4f05]
        Physical Slot: 1
        Flags: bus master, fast devsel, latency 0, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (64-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [40] Power Management version 2
        Capabilities: [50] MSI: Enable- Count=1/1 Maskable- 64bit-
        Capabilities: [60] Express Legacy Endpoint, MSI 00
        Capabilities: [90] MSI-X: Enable- Count=1 Masked-
        Capabilities: [100] Advanced Error Reporting
        Capabilities: [140] Virtual Channel
        Capabilities: [160] Device Serial Number 00-00-00-00-00-00-00-00
        Kernel driver in use: ath9k
===ath9k info dump=== 
[38368.602572] ath: phy16: ASPM enabled: 0x42
[38368.602575] ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x0
[38368.602576] ath: EEPROM indicates default country code should be used
[38368.602577] ath: doing EEPROM country->regdmn map search
[38368.602578] ath: country maps to regdmn code: 0x3a
[38368.602579] ath: Country alpha2 being used: US
[38368.602580] ath: Regpair used: 0x3a
[38368.608643] ieee80211 phy16: Selected rate control algorithm 'minstrel_ht'
[38368.609087] ieee80211 phy16: Atheros AR9280 Rev:2 mem=0xffffc90007780000, irq=19
